title: Mini-Ep 221: Buyer's Remorse
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 221: Buyer's Remorse
itunes:subtitle: Kate is again joined by Caroline Moss and Nora McInerny to answer listener questions all about the things we want and need. From what to buy for a new place, to how to shop for a suit, to starting over after a 10-year relationship, they get into the ni...
description:
Kate is again joined by Caroline Moss and Nora McInerny to answer listener questions all about the things we want and need. From what to buy for a new place, to how to shop for a suit, to starting over after a 10-year relationship, they get into the nitty-gritty on shopping — and not shopping! — as self-care.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
